bibl.title: Quantifying Literacy in the Early Roman Arsinoitês: the Case of the Grapheion Document.
When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday

bibl.note: Originally presented in the 27th Congress of Papyrologists, Warsaw 29.7.-3.8.2013. A modified version was held in a lecture delivered on 4.8.2014 at Tel Aviv University.
bibl.seg: Uri Yiftach, Quantifying Literacy in the Early Roman Arsinoitês: the Case of the Grapheion Document.

David M. Schaps, Uri Yiftach & Daniela Dueck (edd.), When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday = Graeca Tergestina. Storia e Civiltà. 3 (Trieste, 2016) pp. 269-281, 4 tabl.
Originally presented in the 27th Congress of Papyrologists, Warsaw 29.7.-3.8.2013. A modified version was held in a lecture delivered on 4.8.2014 at Tel Aviv University.
